divs: sighting detailson 02\27\2012 i was sitting having lunch at 12:39 pm, i am faceing the window, its a clear blue sky with no clouds, i am speaking on the phone with m. as i look up, i see a white, disc shaped aspirin like round object moving really fast as it appears its being chased by 3 fighter jets blowing white smoke from their tails ends, but the object was in front of the jets in a much much faster speed, they could not keep up with the object. i sit and tell my friend i want to tell you something that i am seeing and i know youre not going to believe me, so i won't say anything, so he tells me tell me what is it. and this is what i saw. this disc shaped white aspirin life object appears is being chased by three fighter jets and they could not keep up the pace or speed of this object.
